section.title: Provisioning and Authentication API
section.para: &PRODUCT; expects that a customer will have their own user provisioning infrastructure. It provides APIs to integrate with these existing systems where the systems call out to &PRODUCT; to add/remove users..

&PRODUCT; supports pluggable authenticators. By default, &PRODUCT; assumes it is provisioned with the userâ€™s password, and as a result authentication is done locally. However, external authentication is possible as well. For example, see Using an LDAP Server for User Authentication.
